item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to my website. It’s currently under construction, as websites often are.

item.title: Code
item.description: Projects I develop, contribute to or mantain A video / image classification and description wrapper in python3 and tensorflow, found here. The bde event detection module (github) and its corresponding docker image (github, docker hub). Useful stuff (not only) for developers Efficient replacements to the horrible linux man pages, like cheat and tldr. Good terminal editors (i.e., not nano) like emacs or vim or more recent alternatives like micro.

item.title: About
item.description: I am a computer scientist currently pursuing my PhD in Machine Learning and working as a research associate in the Institute of Informatics and Telecommunications in NCSR Demokritos. You can get a pdf of my detailed cv in English and Greek (Updated 11-2017). Alternatively, check out a tl;dr version below. Education PhD in machine learning, from the Informatics and Telecommunications department (DIT) of the National and Kapodistrian University of Athens (NKUA), co-supervised by the Institute of Informatics and Telecommunications (IIT) of the National Center for Scientific Research Demokritos (NCSRD) (in progress).
